str2: Afflicted with paralysis. From a derivative of paraluo; as if dissolved, i.e. 'paralytic'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Four. Or neuter tessara a plural number; four.
